title: Words Under the Words: Selected Poems
description: Words Under the Words gathers into a single volume the finest poems by one of the most exciting, accessible poets in America today. This long-awaited collection draws from Naomi Shihab Nye's three critically acclaimed Different Ways to Pray, Yellow Glove, and National Poetry Series winner, Hugging the Jukebox.
author: Naomi Shihab Nye
